member.name: T:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Api.Exceptions.SqlClientFactoryCouldNotBeLoadedException
member.summary: This exception indicates that there was an error loading Microsoft.Data.SqlClient causing SqlClientFactory.Instance to be null. This is most likely a deployment issue.

remarks.para: When using the SqlClientFactory.Instance may not be null.
This exception is identified by error code HK12026.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Api.Exceptions.SqlClientFactoryCouldNotBeLoadedException.EquivalentHttpStatusCode
member.summary: If this error occurs while processing an HTTP request, the request should be terminated with a status code 500 (Internal Server Error).

member.name: T:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Api.Exceptions.SqlServerException
member.summary: All SQL Server related exceptions are thrown within this class.
member.remarks: These exceptions should not be thrown by code outside this module.

member.name: T:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Properties.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Properties.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Properties.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:HAKOM.Persistence.Sql.SqlServer.Net.Properties.Strings.SqlClientFactoryCouldNotBeLoadedExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientFactory.Instance was null. This may be related to a missing/incorrect deps.json file in the application folder..
